docna.cdata!:
India - Fourth Power Transmission Project :
            Credit 0604 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
India - Fourth Power Transmission
            Project : Credit 0604 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
Fourth Power Transmission Project
            components include: Part A - the purchase of equipment and
            materials for transmission systems scheduled to be
            constructed during the period 1976/77-1978/79 (about 2,800
            circuit km of 220 kv overhead transmission lines, about 15
            km of 220 kv and 132 kv underground cable, and substation
            equipment required to increase the capacity of 30
            substations by about 2,700 MVA) by four SEBs and two
            Regional Boards. Part B - the completion of subprojects
            undertaken by eleven other beneficiaries under Credit
            377-IN. Part C - the undertaking of system planning studies
            by the Central Electricity Authority.
